english.segment1: Wishes. The saddest thing is you could be anything that you could want. We could have been everything. But now were not. Now its not anything at all
english.segment2: The hardest part was getting this close to you. And giving up this dream I built with you. A fairytale that isnt coming true. Youve got some growing up to do
english.segment3: CHORUS: I wish we could have worked it out. I wish I didnt have these doubts. I wish I didnt have to wonder just what you are doing now
english.segment4: I wish I didnt know inside. That it wont work out for you and I. I wish that I could stop this wishing. And just say my last goodbye
english.segment5: After all the things you put me through. Tell me why Im still in love with you. And why am I, why am I still waiting for your call
english.segment6: You broke my heart. Im taking it back from you. Im taking back the life that I gave to you. Life goes on before and after you. Ive got some growing up to do. CHORUS
english.segment7: Its time I said my last goodbye. Goodbye. Goodbye. Its time I said my last goodbye. CHORUS
english.segment8: Its time I said my last goodbye. Goodbye. Goodbye. Its time I said my last goodbye
